title: iLamarimAnnayanE
sahitya:
iLamarimannayanE pati virahAlinniyalunniha tApamapAram


caraNam 1    kaLakaLa kOkila nAda madhunA kaLamoLi mArmaNi paramasahyam
    caraNam 2    kuLir taLir talpamatumpati lIlam kaLabhagatE smArayati nikAmam
    caraNam 3    naLina vilOcana nAmmama kAntam nalamODAnaya sArasanAbham
